LanguageData.Ammo_4570Gov_FMJ.label: .45-70 Government cartridge (FMJ)
LanguageData.Ammo_4570Gov_FMJ.description: Rather large and bulky rifle cartridge propelled by a charge of 'black powder'. Good for making people imitate sacks when they are hit.
